alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Colquitt; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:54AM EDT until June 12 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 700 AM EDT. * At 554 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newton to near Blakely, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Morgan, Moultrie, Blakely, Pelham, Camilla, Edison, Arlington, Norman Park, Baconton, Doerun, Leary, Riverside, Douglasville, Centerville, Schley, Funston, Sale City and Damascus. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Colquitt; Dougherty; Early; Miller; Mitchell; Worth
